title.title: Frequently Asked Questions
title.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

faq1.question: What exactly is included in each plan?
faq1.description: All plans include custom design, responsive layout, fast loading speed, basic SEO, and post-launch support. The differences lie in the number of pages, level of customization, revision rounds, and advanced integrations.

faq2.question: How long will it take to have my website ready?
faq2.description: Starter: 5 days, Business: 2–3 weeks, Premium: 4–6 weeks depending on scope. We adapt to your schedule so you don't lose valuable time.

faq3.question: Do I have to pay everything upfront?
faq3.description: No. You can split the payment into 2 or 3 parts depending on the plan. This lowers the barrier and keeps the process smooth.

faq4.question: Can I request changes if I don’t like the result?
faq4.description: Yes. Each plan includes revisions (1, 2, or 3 depending on the package). Plus, we work closely with you step by step to ensure the website reflects your vision.

faq5.question: What happens after the website is delivered?
faq5.description: You’ll receive included support (7, 30, or 90 days depending on the plan). During this time, we handle questions, minor adjustments, and make sure everything runs smoothly.

faq6.question: Will my website look good on mobile and load fast?
faq6.description: Absolutely. We design with a mobile-first approach and speed optimization to ensure your site looks great on every device.

faq7.question: Can I add more pages or features later?
faq7.description: Yes. You can always scale your website with new sections, integrations, or features whenever you need.

faq8.question: Why choose you over another agency?
faq8.description: Because I combine strategic design, user experience (UX) focus, and clear timelines. You won’t just get a beautiful site — you’ll get a tool that converts and grows with your business.
